General.Name: Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd. engages in the design, production, marketing, and sale of gold, jewelry, and other precious metal handicrafts in China. The company was formerly known as Beijing Kingee Culture Development Ltd. and changed its name Beijing Kingee Culture Development Co., Ltd. in July 2010. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Yuping  Sun
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
